casebody.data:
Robert Clinton SATTERFIELD, Appellant, v. Otto C. BOLES, Warden of the West Virginia State Penitentiary, Appellee. No. 11689. United States Court of Appeals Fourth Circuit. Argued March 4, 1969. Decided March 7, 1969.

Before HAYNSWORTH, Chief Judge, and CRAVEN and BUTZNER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Denial of habeas corpus is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion of the District Judge, 297 F.Supp. 609.

Affirmed.
